alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Northwestern Nye County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 1:32PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lander, north central Nye, northwestern White Pine, southwestern Elko and Eureka Counties through 215 PM PDT... At 130 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 7 miles east of Hickison Summit, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eureka, Hickison Summit, Eureka Airport, Kingston, Austin, Pinto Summit, Grass Valley, Diamond Valley, Gillman Springs, Garden Pass, Railroad Pass, Newark Valley, Mount Callaghan, Pancake Summit, Monitor Valley, Antelope Peak, Bob Scott Summit, Overland Pass and Big Bald Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
